sec.p: Financial support for the Wild Bird Mortality Project (1992–2004) (A.A.C), Garden Bird Health Initiative (2005–2012) (B.L. and A.A.C.) and the Garden Wildlife Health Project (2013–2017) (B.L. and A.A.C.) was provided by the following organizations: Birdcare Standards Association, British Trust for Ornithology, British Veterinary Association Animal Welfare Foundation, CJ Wildbird Foods, Cranswick Pet Products, Defra and the Welsh Government through the Animal and Plant Health Agency's Diseases of Wildlife Scanning Surveillance Scheme (APHA DoWS Project ED1600), and through project WC 1027 from the Defra Strategic Evidence Fund, the Esmée Fairbairn Foundation (11-0701 and 15-3008), Gardman Ltd, the Royal Society for the Protection of Birds, Tom Chambers Ltd, the Universities Federation for Animal Welfare and the Zoological Society of London.
